detected_errors.description: More than half of the rooms/spaces present in the 2D plan are not represented in the 3D model (e.g., multiple bedrooms/bath/WC/laundry/pantry/activity/alfresco/verandah/portico are missing or collapsed into fewer generic spaces), breaking layout fidelity.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it omits/merges a majority of the 2D plan’s rooms, failing the required layout completeness threshold.
